snippet: Globalization has meant lower prices for Americans, but it’s meant lower wages, too.
abstract: Op-Ed article by economist Jared Bernstein argues politicians must do more to address negative impact globalization and expanded free trade have had on domestic jobs and wages; suggests energy spent on negotiating free-trade pacts should be redirected to reviving manufacturing sector and fighting currency manipulation.
lead_paragraph: Globalization has meant lower prices for Americans, but it’s meant lower wages, too.

headline.print_headline: Free Trade Is Fading. Now What?
headline.main: The Era of Free Trade Might Be Over. That’s a Good Thing.
